about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

Step into the near-futuristic dystopia that is Vacancy City. In an open-world, action-RPG featuring a combination of elements from Western and Japanese RPGs. Join the ragtag squad of unlikely allies led by the war veteran-turned-mercenary Fawke Harvey as they apprehend crime while they uncover a conspiracy which threatens the whole city.

FIGHT AS A TEAM


As a squad with 8 playable characters ranging from a high-tech infiltrator to a Chinese martial artist who impersonates the mythological character Sun Wukong in action packed combat on the dangerous streets of Vacancy City.

ENJOY THE CITYLIFE


Enter the world of Vacancy City filled with many city districts from the Asian influenced Little Asia to the art-deco inspired Luxe, enjoy what each district has to offer being eateries, shops, and entertainment but do be careful who you may encounter.

CONNECT WITH OTHERS


Vacancy City is filled with colourful, larger-than-life characters waiting to be interacted with. Create relationships with them by communicating them via dialogue or private messages, and experience the many stories they have to tell.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of stylised violence with blood, suicide, use of alcohol, drugs, and tobacco.

name: Sinthetic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
